description:
Description

FARM STAY Visible Difference Snail BB Cream SPF40/PA++ 50g

BB cream that brightens and brightens dark skin tone

 It's the BB cream contains 500mg of snail mucus filtrate 

Moist cover / Wrinkling improvement / UV protection triple functional cosmetics

It is a BB cream that effectively corrects skin blemishes and expresses the skin clean and clear with a silky feel that applies smoothly as if soaking into the skin and excellent adhesion.

In addition, the snail mucus filtrate moisturizes the skin and balances the skin, making skin blemishes natural, fresh and clean.

When applied to the skin, you can feel the moisture sensation of the snail mucus filtrate, and it supplies moisture to the inside of the skin to maintain a natural and moist makeup over time.
 
How To Use
Apply an appropriate amount gently from the inside of the face to the outside.
 
Key Ingredients
Purified water, titanium oxide, glycerin, ethylhexylmethoxycinnamate, isopropyl myristate, mineral oil, polyglyceryl-4 isostearate, dimethicone, stearic acid, sodium chloride, beeswax, butylene glycol, adenosine ,Green tea extract, ginseng extract, hydrolyzed collagen, snail mucus filtrate (500mg), stem cell extract fragrance, etc.

reviews.title: Shades are not accurate
reviews.content: I bought 3 shades: 13, 21, 23. None of them are the perfect shade for me. Im somewhere in between 13 and 21 (I’m warm toned shade 21 in Parnell and other brands). 21 looks way more gray and darker than it should be (compared to other brands). 23 is just too dark. Coverage is great as I have many acne scars. I also have dry skin and it doesnt feel dry on me or look cakey. I mix 2:1 13 and 21 and apply to my face with a makeup spatula. Lasts all day on me and doesnt oxidize much.

reviews.title: Made me break out
reviews.content: the coverage was good, but I found out that it broke me out days later

description:
Description


This perfecting foundation with SPF 35, PA++ helps prep a perfect canvas and reduce wrinkles.
Creates a long-lasting but thin and light cover make-up for your day.
Tightly adheres to your skin without making it oily.
The vegan formula enriched with 4 types of plant extracts such as Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract and Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract which provide long-lasting moisture to the skin.
 How To Use

Apply a moderate amount to the skin with a puff and pat it gently.

description:
Description
- This makeup essential now available in a cute travel size! It fits perfectly in your makeup pouch for your next trip or daily touch up on the go.- Combine skincare and makeup in one easy step for flawless skin with M Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 PA+++. M Perfect is a BB cream that offers medium to high coverage, all while keeping makeup light and providing UV protection with lasting moisture.- The lightweight BB cream brightens, evens, soothes, and covers discoloration and imperfections of the skin. Recommended for all skin types.No.13 Bright Beige for Fair Skin No.21 Light Beige for Bright SkinNo.23 Natural Beige for Light with Neutral Skin ToneNo.25 Warm beige for light/medium with neutral skin tone No.27 Honey beige for medium/tan skin

How To Use1. Prepare your skin using M BB Boomer primer. 2. Pump an appropriate amount of product onto fingertips or a makeup sponge. 3. Gently blend on to skin and layer depending on desired coverage.

description:
Description

- Achieve perfectly airbrushed skin without the need for Photoshop.
- The Holika Holika Petit BB Shimmering brightening BB cream with SPF 40 will take care of it. It is formulated with pearl powder that instantly brightens your complexion and covers imperfections.
- SPF 40 protects your skin against signs of premature ageing, keeping your skin moisturised throughout the entire day. With regular use, the product has a mild lightening effect that results in flawless, porcelain skin.

How To Use
Apply a sufficient amount of BB cream to the skin and spread evenly with your fingers or an applicator.
Key Ingredients
Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Cyclohexasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Zinc Oxide (CI 77947), Glycerin, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Cetyl Dimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Stearic Acid, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Methylparaben, Chlorphenesin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Fragrance (Parfum), Propylparaben, Tocopheryl Acetate, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Disodium EDTA, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Isobutylparaben

description:
Description

- A mini size version of CLIO's best-selling liquid foundation.
- Comes in 3 shades, helps create flawless skin look with semi-matte finish.
- Presents light-weight texture, fix on skin seamlessly without caking.
- Covers skin imperfection and pores with perfect full coverage.
- Offers prolonged adherence with 72-hours adhesion power without darkening.
- In super easy to blend and build texture even apply with fingertips.

How To Use

1. Take a moderate amount and gently spread over face according to the skin texture.
2. Gently dab the foundation with makeup sponge or fingertips to enhance makeup adherence.
Key Ingredients
Cyclohexasiloxane, Water, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Niacinamide, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Magnesium Sulfate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Tocopherol, Glucose, Fragrance, Iron Oxides(Ci 77492), Iron Oxides(Ci 77491), Iron Oxides(Ci 77499)

description:
Description

- This Wink Sun Base helps to prep your skin by smoothening skin texture.
- Provides SPF 50, PA+++ UV protection.
- Covers up pores and bumps on your skin.
- Brightens up skin complexion and creates a natural-looking base.
- Offers excellent absorption without leaving a white cast.
- Prevents skin barrier damage by blocking UVA and UVB.
- Helps to restore skin with Soothe Complex, which includs Xylitol to cool down skin temperature, Centella Asiatica Extract and Aloe Arborescens Leaf Extract to soothe skin by delivering deep hydration.

How To Use

Apply a moderate amount and gently spread evenly on the entire face.

product_name: Pro Tailor Be Glow Foundation SPF27 PA++ 30g (#5 TAN)
description:
Please note that the expiration date of the item is 2025-Sep.-14. Exchange & refund is not possible due to this reason. Description

- A transparent glow powder that shines elasticly for 24 hours.
- It's Triple Volume Complex that boosts moisture and elasticity at the same time, and it gives off a clear glow that shines healthily from the inside of your skin.
- It provides an ultra-adhesive light cover that adheres more to the skin with a thinner makeup film.
- It fills the moisture layer in the skin and lasts longer to shine on the skin with a composite film former.

How To Use
Take an appropriate amount and spread it evenly on the skin.

Key Ingredients
Purified water, diphenylsiloxyphenyl trimethicone, titanium dioxide (CI 77891), methyl trimethicone, ethylhexylmethoxycinnamate, glycerin, butylene glycol, lauryl PEG-9 polydimethylsiloxyethyldi Methicone, isododecane, trimethylsiloxysilicate, isononylisononanoate, silica, polyphenylsilsesquioxane, diisostearylmalate, laurylpolyglyceryl-3polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, 1,2-hexanediol, hydrogenated polyisobutene, disteadimonium hectorite, yellow iron oxide, sodium chloride, acrylate/polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate copolymer, dimethicone , triethylhexanoin, trihydroxystearin, aluminum hydroxide, fragrance, triethoxycaprylylsilane, caprylyl glycol, vinyldimethicone/lauryldimethicone crosspolymer, acrylate/di Methicone copolymer, red iron oxide, ethylhexyl glycerin, disodium EDITA, propylene carbonate, black iron oxide, BT, tocopherol, propanediol, sodium hyaluronate, water-soluble collagen, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid Acid, sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, hyaluronic acid, acetyl heptapeptide-4, sodium acetylated hyaluronate, acetylhexapeptide-8, sodium hydroxide, acetyloctapeptide-3

product_name: Moringa Ceramide BB Cream SPF 30 PA++ #31N Deep
description:
Please note that the expiration date of the item is 2026-Mar.-26. Exchange & refund is not possible due to this reason. Description

Redness cover and barrier care at the same time! Moist Ceramide BB Cream without dryness. 
CERAMIDE CARE COVER: Protect your skin's moisture barrier with moringa ceramide and take cover with excellent adhesion.
It is a moisturizing BB cream that naturally helps to cover blemishes with a soft texture and helps skin moisturizing barrier care with moringa fermented oil and eco-ceramide.
Natural color expression: It covers red skin, dull skin, and uneven skin tone to create a natural makeup look.
Soft cream texture: The soft cream texture, which is not heavy without feeling stuffy or sticky, adheres to the skin and adds moisture.
More complete coverage with 6 shades to match different skin tones.
 
How To Use
At the last step of basic skin care, take an appropriate amount and apply
evenly. Apply one more layer to the troubled areas that need coverage.

reviews.title: Best foundation hands down
reviews.content: I never knew laniege made foundation and this has become a favorite of mine. I use a little bit for a more light weight look and it really holds up well on my combination skin. Also does not break me out and the pump packaging is easy to use and keep clean. I can’t wait to try the cushion version of this.

reviews.title: Cute packaging, dries fast
reviews.content: The cap is magnetic and snaps on when I'm finished with using the foundation. The overall packaging is compact and cute! For the functionality of the foundation itself, like other reviewers I confirm the foundation does dry fast so you either have to quickly spread the foundation on your face or maybe mix it with some serum to give you a wider window for application. Finally, cost-wise it's a lot for me to fork over for foundation, so unfortunately this product is only going to grace my make-up cabinet when there's a discount.

product_name: M Pefect Covering BB Cream SPF42 PA+++ 50ml (7 colors)
description:
Description


Originally developed as a salve for patients after laser treatment, BB Cream’s soothing and regenerative properties were adapted for cosmetics to improve skin while providing coverage. The M Perfect Cover BB Cream is Missha’s most popular product with over 30 million sold worldwide. Combining cosmetics with skin care, this product promotes natural-looking coverage while providing sun protection, treating dark spots, and preventing wrinkles. The M Perfect Cover BB Cream(100% Genuine, KOREA Original)is suitable for all skin types and can be used as a makeup base or foundation.

 
How To Use

After your basic skin care routine, use a primer for an even base
Pump out an appropriate amount of BB Cream (1 pump is usually more than sufficient)
Dab product on cheeks, forehead, chin, and nose areas and use the tips of your fingers to lightly smooth product over face OR Lightly dab product with a sponge and smooth evenly over face
Build coverage using leftover product by lightly tapping over any problem areas
Set with powder for a matte finish if desired
 
Active Ingredients

Water(Aqua), Cyclomethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Zinc Oxide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mineral Oil, Phenyl Trimethicone, Talc, Arbutin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Dimethicone, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Squalane, Adenosine, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Polyethylene, Beeswax(Cera Alba), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Caviar Extract, Algae Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Fagus Sylvatica Bud Extract, Ceramide 3, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance(Parfum), Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol MAY CONTAIN[+/-; Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Iron Oxides(CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]
 
 
Benefits of Missha M Perfect Covering BB Cream SPF42 PA+++

BB Cream (short for Blemish Balm Cream ) was first created by dermatologists to treat and protect skin after skin surgery. Celebrities started to use it for natural-flawless-glowing look, soon it became popular. Missha has reformulated BB Cream for use with general population. Missha BB Cream maintained original bb cream’s protecting ability, perfected coverage, adhesion, light-weight texture, UV protection and improved fine lines and uneven skin tone correction. M Perfect Cover BB Cream is the most popular BB Cream among Beauty experts. The tremendous popularity spread to Japan, then all over Asia and now even in Western countries such as USA, Canada, Australia and France. It creates natural flawless look and works as a moisturizer, UV protector, concealer and foundation, All in One in a tube.

 
​
